{"id":938213686,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1682221121,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/938213686/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sliding Subarray Beauty","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> getSubarrayBeauty(vector<int>& nums, int k, int x) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> result;\n        priority_queue<int> pq; // max heap to store negative numbers\n\n        // Process the first k-1 elements\n        for (int i = 0; i < k - 1; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < 0) {\n                pq.push(nums[i]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        // Process subarrays of size k and calculate beauty\n        for (int i = k - 1; i < n; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < 0) {\n                pq.push(nums[i]);\n            }\n\n            int beauty = 0;\n            if (!pq.empty()) {\n                int size = pq.size();\n                if (size >= x) {\n                    for (int j = 1; j <= x; j++) {\n                        beauty = pq.top();\n                        pq.pop();\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            result.push_back(beauty);\n\n            // Remove element that is no longer part of the subarray\n            if (nums[i - k + 1] < 0) {\n                pq.pop();\n            }\n        }\n\n        return result;\n    }\n};\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sliding-subarray-beauty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
